spring_first_1: The sudden shift in weather always throws me off, but it's nice to finally get a break from the harsh winter.$1
spring_first_2: It's such a relief to not have to deal with how cold the snow is.$1#$b#But... I'm gonna miss watching the snow fall.$2
spring_first_3: Now that it's spring, it's time for me to start my spring cleaning!$1#$e#Do you think you'll do spring cleaning this year?
spring_first_4: Finally! We can see nature thrive again.$1#$b#It's kinda boring just seeing a bunch of snow everywhere all the time. Flowers help give nature life!
eggFestival_yesterday_1: Are you ready for the Egg Festival tomorrow?$3#$e#I'm not gonna join in on the egg hunt. I have more fun watching people frantically hunt for the eggs!$1
eggFestival_yesterday_2: Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you about the Egg Festival in case you forgot to check your mail.$1#$e#There's no pressure for you to participate though.#$b#You're an adult. Live your best life!
eggFestival_yesterday_3: It might be a little silly but I'm not feeling the Egg Festival vibe this year.$11#$e#Maybe Harvey needs to adjust my medication dosage or something...$17#$b#Don't mind me. I'm just thinking out loud.$11
eggFestival_yesterday_4: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at the Egg Festival.$11
eggFestival_today_1: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Egg Festival is happening today.$1#$e#I can't wait for the Egg Festival to start! It's gonna be so much fun.$1
eggFestival_today_2: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Egg Festival is happening today.$1#$e#I would help set up the festival but I usually just end up getting in the way.$11#$b#It's more effort for people to explain how to get things done to me. It's better if I just stay off to the side during the setup.$12
eggFestival_today_3: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Egg Festival is happening today.$1#$e#Imagine if people gave gifts during the Egg Festival!$1#$e#Would the gift theme just be anything related to eggs? Now I gotta think about it.$17
eggFestival_today_4: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Egg Festival is happening today.$1#$e#Are you gonna come to the Egg Festival today? It'd be awesome if you joined us!$1#$b#I completely understand if you're too busy though.
eggFestival_tomorrow_1: The Egg festival was a ton of fun! I hope you managed to take a plate of food home with you.$1#$e#
eggFestival_tomorrow_2: Those deviled eggs were so good! I gotta try to convince Gus to sell them at the Saloon.$1#$e#He might need an egg supplier for that though.$17
eggFestival_tomorrow_3: The festival was pretty exhausting yesterday.$2#$e#I think I just got overwhelmed by being around people for so long.$11#$b#I actually have a limited social battery. I know it's pretty strange for someone like me.$11
eggFestival_tomorrow_4: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at tomorrow's festival.$11
eggFestival_tomorrow_5: I think I used my legs way too much yesterday! My legs are hurting so bad right now.$2#$e#I'll definitely need to take it easy today.$11
flowerDance_yesterday_1: No one has asked me to the Flower Dance but I still practice every year just in case.$1
flowerDance_yesterday_2: Some people find the Flower Dance to be romantic so asking someone to dance is similar to asking them on a date.#$e#I don't think like that though.$1#$b#If you wanna dance with the homie then dance with the homie!$1
flowerDance_yesterday_3: I wanna fast-forward time so the Flower Dance can start finally!$3#$e#I wanna see a performance, not stand here all day.$17
flowerDance_yesterday_4: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at the Flower Dance.$11
flowerDance_yesterday_5: How cool would it be if someone had their wedding during the Flower Dance?$6#$e#I feel like it would be super symbolic and romantic.$4
flowerDance_today_1: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Flower Dance is happening today.$1#$e#I can't wait to see the Flower Dance this year! Everyone dances so well.$3
flowerDance_today_2: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Flower Dance is happening today.$1#$e#I wonder if anyone will ask to dance with me this year.$1#$b#It probably won't happen. I don't talk to people enough for that to happen.$11
flowerDance_today_3: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Flower Dance is happening today.$1#$e#I bet the food at the Flower Dance is gonna taste good! Gus never lets us down when it comes to catering.$1
flowerDance_today_4: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Flower Dance is happening today.$1#$e#I wonder what I'm gonna wear to the Flower Dance today...$16
flowerDance_tomorrow_1: I'm pretty tired from the dance yesterday, but it was so much fun!$1
flowerDance_tomorrow_2: I wonder who came up with the flower dance in the first place.$17#$b#The movements are very graceful.$1
flowerDance_tomorrow_3: I wonder how many people are exhausted from the Flower Dance.$17#$b#I always get curious about that kind of thing.
summer_first_1: Uh oh... Get ready for the heat.$12
summer_first_2: I'm worried that there's gonna be a heatwave this year... We live close to Calico Desert after all.$12
summer_first_3: The weather is giving me a headache right now... I need to drink some water.$11
summer_first_4: Stay hydrated, @! It can get dangerous if you don't drink enough water.
luau_yesterday_1: I wonder what everyone's bringing the Luau tomorrow!$1#$e#I'm just looking forward to whatever Gus makes. You gotta have some!$3
luau_yesterday_2: Hopefully it's not too hot this year at the Luau.$2#$e#Listen. We don't need Harvey to work on his day off because of heat-related illnesses.$2
luau_yesterday_3: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at the Luau.$11
luau_today_1: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Flower Dance is happening today.$1#$e#Call me crazy but I'm pretty sure I can smell the food from here!$3#$e#You better grab some food from the Luau before I get there. When I see that food... it's on SIGHT.$1
luau_today_2: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Flower Dance is happening today.$1#$e#I wonder if the governor is gonna like the soup at the Luau this year.$17#$b#I bet it'd be REALLY bad if he didn't like the soup.$12
luau_today_3: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Flower Dance is happening today.$1#$e#It's kinda weird to have the governor come by for the Luau every year.$17#$b#I dunno... It just seems odd.$17
luau_tomorrow_1: Ugh... I'm nauseous... I ate too much food at the Luau.$2#$e#I should've listened to Gus when he told me to slow down.$12
luau_tomorrow_2: The food was absolutely amazing at the Luau yesterday!$1#$e#I wish there was leftovers.$2
luau_tomorrow_3: I'm lowkey glad that the governor is gone. It's stressful having authority like him hang around.$2#$e#It's not my fault that I find authority intimidating.$17
moonlightJellies_yesterday_1: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at tomorrow's festival.$11
moonlightJellies_yesterday_2: I heard the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies is tomorrow! I hope you come watch.$3#$e#It's so beautiful. I wish we could see it happen more than once a year.$1
moonlightJellies_yesterday_3: I love going to the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies! Seeing all those colors in the water looks so magical.$1#$e#I hope you decide to go to the festival tomorrow. I promise you'll love it!
moonlightJellies_today_1: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies is happening tonight.$1#$e#I can't wait to see the Moonlight Jellies tonight! It's gonna be stunning, I know it.$1
moonlightJellies_today_2: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies is happening tonight.$1#$e#I wonder how many Moonlight Jellies there are in the world. I bet it's a ton!$3
moonlightJellies_today_3: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies is happening tonight.$1#$e#I wonder if anyone is bringing food to the event.$17
moonlightJellies_tomorrow_1: I think I stayed up too late last night. I'm so drowsy.$2
moonlightJellies_tomorrow_2: There were so many moonlight jellies last night! They were so cool to see in person!$3
moonlightJellies_tomorrow_3: I love how the weather yesterday was perfect to enjoy watching the moonlight jellies swim by.
fall_first_1: Now that it's fall, I can start stomping on all the crunchy leaves!$1
fall_first_2: I wonder if I can use the dead leaves I find today to fuel the campfire by my tent.$17#$e#My pockets aren't super deep, but it might be worth a shot!$1
fall_first_3: I think fall is one of the best seasons because it's perfect for getting cozy, but without it being too hot or cold.
fall_first_4: It's the season of Spirit's Eve! I can't wait for it to time to celebrate again.$3
stardewFair_yesterday_1: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at tomorrow's festival.$11
stardewFair_yesterday_2: Since the Stardew Valley Fair is tomorrow, I wonder what everyone likes about it.#$e#I know that some people only go to the fair to see the grange displays.#$b#Personally, I go for the carnival games! The fishing one is a blast!$3
stardewFair_yesterday_3: I wonder who's gonna enter the grange display contest at the fair tomorrow.$1
stardewFair_today_1: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Stardew Valley Fair is happening today.$1#$e#I know that I'll be going to the fair!$1#$b#If you decide to go, are you gonna focus on the carnival games or the grange displays?
stardewFair_today_2: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Stardew Valley Fair is happening today.$1#$e#I wonder who's gonna win the grange display contest this year.$3#$e#I guess we'll see!$1
stardewFair_today_3: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Stardew Valley Fair is happening today.$1#$e#Once the fair is over, then everyone will be focusing on Spirit's Eve!$3
stardewFair_tomorrow_1: I used up a lot of my energy yesterday, but I'm all good!$1#$e#I spent a lot of time at the fishing game.#$b#The guy running the booth probably got confused about me being there for over an hour straight.$11
stardewFair_tomorrow_2: The grange displays were really amazing this year!$1#$b#I bet next year will be even better$3
stardewFair_tomorrow_3: I wonder how long it took for everyone to pack up when the festival ended.$17#$b#The clown probably was the first to leave since they didn't have many props.
spiritsEve_yesterday_1: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at tomorrow's festival.$11
spiritsEve_yesterday_2: I have a big collection of costumes for Spirit's Eve.#$e#I bet you can't guess what I'll wear tomorrow.$1
spiritsEve_yesterday_3: Spirit's Eve is tomorrow! I'm always excited for it.$1#$e#It's always fun embracing the spookier parts of life, you know?
spiritsEve_today_1: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that Spirit's Eve is happening tonight.$1#$e#I wonder what people are bringing for Spirit's Eve.#$b#Or is Gus the one catering everything?#$b#No one tells me these things.$11
spiritsEve_today_2: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that Spirit's Eve is happening tonight.$1#$e#It's Spirit's Eve! It's Spirit's Eve!$3
spiritsEve_today_3: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that Spirit's Eve is happening tonight.$1#$e#I wonder who's gonna wear costumes this year...
spiritsEve_tomorrow_1: I definitely stayed up too late last night. I'm all kinds of drowsy right now.$2
spiritsEve_tomorrow_2: Damn, that food was so good! I'm glad I didn't skip Spirit's Eve this year.$1
spiritsEve_tomorrow_3: I'm so full from last night's food, but it was totally worth it.$1
winter_first_1: Winter has officially started. I hope it doesn't get too cold this year.$2#$e#Be sure you have your blankets and heaters ready. It's gonna be chilly!
winter_first_2: Do you have your warm clothes ready?#$e#It's gonna be a cold season.$2
winter_first_3: Since today's the first day of winter...#$b#Do you think it's safe for me to eat some of the snow on the ground?$3#$e#Snow tastes so good.$1
winter_first_4: Now that it's winter, make sure you stay warm.#$b#We don't want anyone getting hypothermia.$2
iceFestival_yesterday_1: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at tomorrow's festival.$11
iceFestival_yesterday_2: It'd be cool if Mayor Lewis had a snowperson competition at the Ice Festival! I'd try to make something super cool.$3#$e#I'd probaby make something cursed.$1#$b#Like a monster that only has two legs, a torso, and a head with one eye!$3
iceFestival_yesterday_3: Maybe one of these days I'll do the ice fishing competition at the Ice Festival.#$e#I'll need a fishing pole, though.$2
iceFestival_today_1: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Ice Festival is happening today.$1#$e#The weather is perfect for the Ice Festival!$1
iceFestival_today_2: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Ice Festival is happening today.$1#$e#I wonder who's gonna win the fishing competition this year!$1
iceFestival_today_3: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Ice Festival is happening today.$1#$e#I'll be busy building snowpeople at the festival.#$b#I wonder what they're gonna look like.$1
iceFestival_tomorrow_1: The Ice Festival was so much fun!$1#$b#Did you enjoy it?
iceFestival_tomorrow_2: I wish the Ice Festival lasted longer.$2#$e#Oh well, it was fun!$1
iceFestival_tomorrow_3: I got some compliments on the snowpeople I made yesterday!$1#$b#It's a pretty big achievement for me.
bdayCheckup_1: It's my birthday today!$3#$e#Happy birthday to me~! Happy birthday to me~!$1
bdayCheckup_2: Today's my birthday!$3#$b#I also have my checkup today, but that's not as important.$1
bdayCheckup_3: Today's my birthday!$1#$b#Since I have the day off, I can take it easy.
winterStar_yesterday_1: It's kinda funny how there's never any rain during festivals.$1#$e#Let's just hope we don't get random rain at tomorrow's festival.$11
winterStar_yesterday_2: I wonder what everyone's getting for the Winter Star.#$e#I wonder who my secret gift-giver is.$1
winterStar_yesterday_3: I can't wait to see everyone at the festival tomorrow.$3#$b#I miss hanging out with the people in town.$2
winterStar_today_1: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Feast of the Winter Star is happening today.$1#$e#I can't wait to see everyone today.$1
winterStar_today_2: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Feast of the Winter Star is happening today.$1#$e#I wonder what food is gonna be there this year.$3
winterStar_today_3: Good morning, @! Mayor Lewis wanted me to remind you that the Feast of the Winter Star is happening today.$1#$e#I wonder who my secret gift-giver is!$3
winterStar_tomorrow_1: It was great spending time with everyone yesterday.#$e#Everyone got really cool presents too!$1
winterStar_tomorrow_2: I think I spent too much time at the festival.$2#$b#I got really worn out from talking to everyone.$11
winterStar_tomorrow_3: The food was so good this year!$1#$b#Luckily there was enough leftovers for me to bring some home.
generic_1: I don't think I drank enough water yesterday. I have a massive headache right now.$2
generic_2: %Raven says nothing but nods their head at you with a big smile.#$b#!$1
generic_3: I know how risky you get sometimes so try to stay safe today!$1
generic_4: I hope you have time to relax every once in a while!$1#$e#It's good to not push yourself too hard.
generic_5: Sorry, I'm not really in the mood to talk to people today.$2#$b#It's not you. I'm just having a rough time.$2
generic_6: %Raven says nothing but has a sad look on their face.#$b#...$2
generic_8: Please don't take it personally if I don't speak to you verbally sometimes.#$b#I have moments where I struggle to speak sometimes.$11
generic_9: If I have time, maybe I could play some video games today.$1
generic_10: My feet are really sore today. I should take it easy.$2
generic_11: I need to wash my laundry soon. It's starting to pile up again.$2
generic_12: I swear I forgot something...$17#$e#This always happens.$2
genericspring_1: I really enjoy how the weather is during spring!$1#$b#I do kind of miss winter though.$2
genericspring_2: My eyes are super itchy. I hate seasonal allergies.$2
genericspring_3: ...$16#$b#Oh, I'm just enjoying the weather right now. It's really peaceful.
genericspring_4: With the flowers in bloom, the air smells wonderful!$1#$e#Do you have a favorite flower? My favorite are marigolds.
genericspring_5: The scenery is so colorful during spring. It's perfect for art inspiration!$1
genericspring_6: Sorry, my seasonal allergies are giving me a major headache right now. Maybe we can talk later?$2
genericspring_7: It's odd how I can appreciate the beauty of spring even though my seasonal allergies are making me suffer.
genericsummer_1: Ugh it's so hot!$2#$b#If only it was winter. Then I wouldn't have to worry about trying to cool down all the time.$2
genericsummer_2: Dear Yoba it's so hot! I wish it was any season BUT summer.$2
genericsummer_3: It'd be awesome if we had a community pool! It'd be super handy.#$b#... Okay, but swimming at the beach means sand will be in my hair for weeks.$2
genericsummer_4: I hate to admit that I sometimes enjoy the summer heat.$11#$b#I think it's because being directly in the sun makes my skin feel funny after a while.$1
genericsummer_5: It'd be awesome if there were swimming competitions during the summer.$3#$b#I'm sure plenty of people would participate!$1
genericsummer_6: Yup, I'm super sweaty today.$2#$b#At least I can go to the beach to rinse off!$1
genericsummer_7: I can only imagine how hot it is over in Calico Desert right now.$2#$b#Wait, I think imagining it is actually making me feel hotter.$12
genericfall_1: I love feeling the leaves crunch under my feet!$1
genericfall_2: %Raven stomps hard on the leaves as they walk.#$e#Crunch! Crunch! Crunch!$3
genericfall_3: Since fall is normally the season people make wine, I wonder how much is being made right now.$17#$b#I just hope it tastes good!$1
genericfall_4: I love how it's not too cold outside today.#$b#It's much better than summer was!$1
genericfall_5: If the season of fall was a person, I think we'd be best friends!$1#$b#I connect with nature a lot better during this time of year.
genericfall_6: Imagine if instead of water raining from the sky during the fall, it was leaves falling from the sky?$3#$b#I think it'd be nature littering on itself if that were to happen, though.
genericfall_7: If you have an extra pumpkin lying around, I could definitely use one.#$b#I love making Jack-o-lanterns!$1
genericwinter_1: I love how cold it is today! It feels just right.$1
genericwinter_2: It's s-so cold t-today.$2#$e#%Raven is shivering a lot.
genericwinter_3: I ate a bit of snow this morning.#$b#It tastes pretty good!$1#$e#Yes, I avoid snow that's not an... unnatural color.$2#$b#I wouldn't ever wanna touch discolored snow.$11
genericwinter_4: I don't know why, but the sound of snow falling on top of my tent is annoying.#$b#I never feel that way about rain though.$17
genericwinter_5: Be sure to stay warm! I wouldn't want you to freeze into a popsicle.
genericwinter_6: I might build a snowperson today...$17#$b#I'm still deciding.
genericwinter_7: What's something you enjoy about winter?#$b#I always get curious abouut that kind of thing.$1#$e#That's pretty neat!$1
0hearts_1: Some of the people here say that I have a lot to say.#$e#I can't tell if that's supposed to be a bad thing or not, though.$17
0hearts_2: If you take medications, you can go to Harvey's clinic.#$b#He also sells Ferngill Medical Board approved medications for exhaustion and energy. They work instantly!$1
0hearts_3: I love the library here. There are so many books!$1$#b#There's not nearly enough fantasy in there though..$2
0hearts_4: I know it's weird seeing me nap random places, but since I live out of a tent, I either sleep there or wherever else I can.$11#$e#I know living out of a tent isn't the best, but it's not like a house is gonna appear out of nowhere for me.$2#$b#Pelican Town needs more space for housing if they want more people to move in.$$11
0hearts_5: Mayor Lewis has a strange vibe to him.$17#$b#I don't know what it is, but I feel like he's hiding some secrets.$5#$e#Don't take my word for it though. I could be completely wrong!$11
0hearts_6: Pelican Town has quite the collection of secrets.#$e#I'm just saying, some people are worth side-eyeing.$17
0hearts_7: If you ever talk to Clint... Just be careful. He's got an entire incel vibe to him.$2#$b#I figured I'd let you know.^I figured I let you know since I know you're his type.$2
0hearts_8: It'd be nice if Pelican Town had more events. I like when everyone gets together.#$b#It also gives people days off from work.$1
0hearts_9: Have you been getting along with people in town fine?#$e#That's interesting!$1
0hearts_10: I work at the Saloon a few days a week. I really enjoy being a janitor there.#$e#Did you know that Gus lets staff sit down? We don't have to stand all the time!$3#$b#It's much better than my previous jobs.#$e#It's not like I spend my whole shift sitting, but if I need a breather, he won't judge us for it.$3
2hearts_1: Not gonna lie, it's hard sleeping outdoors, even in a tent.$2#$b#The ground is really hard and I sometimes get bruises from it.$2
2hearts_2: I love how I can learn more about the people in town just from working at the Saloon.#$b#Sometimes you feel bad for some of the people, though.$2
2hearts_3: How are things going for you today?#$e#My day is just like any other day. Kinda boring.$11
2hearts_4: Sometimes it's hard to figure out what to talk about since my life is pretty repetitive.$2#$e#When everything is the same all the time, there's nothing new to talk about.$11
2hearts_5: Be sure you drink some water today. Water is very important!#$e#I know I forget to drink water a lot. Hush.$11
2hearts_6: I've had people tell me that I'm really energetic in odd situations.$17#$b#Doctors and dentists always get confused because I'm so upbeat at appointments.$1
2hearts_7: I should see if Gunther added any new books to the library. I'm dying to see some new books!$1
2hearts_8: You know, I've been curious about programming. Sebastian is the only person in town that I know of who's skilled at programming.#$e#Maybe I could ask him to teach me in his spare time. I don't have a computer and Gunther doesn't have any at the library.
2hearts_9: I wonder what Mayor Lewis actually does as mayor.#$e#There's never any new ordinances for this place. It's pretty static here to be honest.#$b#I feel like he could be doing more to improve the community.
2hearts_10: I wish there were more frogs here.#$b#They're so cool.
4hearts_1: Sometimes I wonder if I should try to move back to the city again.#$b#I don't think I'd be able to afford it, though.
4hearts_2: I'm thinking of also working at Pierre's Seed Shop.$17#$e#Sure, I'm working at the Saloon and helping out with the kids, but I think I'll be able to pull it off!$1

8hearts_1: I'm talking with Mayor Lewis about if I can open a coffee shop here!#$e#I just need to find a place to build it.
8hearts_2: Just imagine there being a coffee shop in town. That would be pretty neat, wouldn't it?$1
8heartsdating_1: This might be a lot to ask for, but could you put in a good word for me with Mayor Lewis?#$b#I'm trying to open a coffee shop, but I need him to trust that I'll do what I can to make sure it provides more jobs to people in town, you know?
8heartsdating_2: You know how some people in town don't have jobs? Well, I wanna try to change that.#$e#Everyone deserves a shot, even in small towns.
10hearts_1: It's wonderful being able to run a coffee shop!$1#$b#It does get pretty exhausting though, but it's very rewarding.$1
10hearts_2: I really love talking to you. You make me feel spiritually 'at home'. It's a great feeling!$1
spring: The air is so wonderful right now. Just warm enough, but not too cool.
summer: I hope the weather doesn't get too bad this summer.#$e#At least we have a beach nearby!
fall: I think fall weather is the best. It's the perfect middle-ground.#$e#At least I won't get burned alive in the summer heat anymore!
winter: It's so chilly outside! It's so uncomfortable.#$e#I'm trying to stay indoors as much as I can so I can avoid freezing.
GreenRain_1: Do you think it's safe to drink the water from green rain?#$e#Maybe I can test it out!#$b#...#$b#Hm... It tastes odd. Not bad, but it's too hard to describe.
GreenRainFinished_1: No one died from the rain, so that's good!#$b#What? I thought it might've been caused by pollution or something.
GreenRain_2: This green rain smells amazing!#$e#I wonder if people will find a way to turn this into a candle scent.
GreenRainFinished_2: Two years in a row of this rain is kinda weird, but I'm not bothered by it.
GreenRain_3_1: One thing I hate about green rain is how much moss there is.#$e#It's a texture thing, blame the autism.
GreenRain_3_2: I wonder what makes the rain green.#$e#I could probably ask Demetrius. He's really good at that stuff.
GreenRain_3_3: I'm not sure if you noticed it, but does the green rain feel different from normal rain?#$e#I could be just imagining things, but it definitely feels different to me.
GreenRain_3_4: I figured that I would gather some moss today. There's so much right now!
GreenRain_3_5: I noticed something really strange. How come some trees and weeds either change or vanish overnight?#$e#It reminds me of a movie...#$b#The one where the guy gets eaten by a tentacle monster and everyone is in a grocery store.#$b#It's one of my childhood favorites!
GreenRain_3_6: Do you do anything different when there's green rain?#$e#That's interesting. Well, keep doing your thing!
GreenRain_3_7: I've never been able to climb trees, but I think it'd be fun to sit on the branches and watch the rain.#$e#I just enjoy nature a lot. It's so beautiful!
GreenRain_3_8: *jumping in puddle* Splash! Splash! Splash!#$e#%Raven is focused on splashing in puddles.
GreenRain_3_9: Is it just me or does the green rain feel more wet than normal rain?#$e#I should ask Demetrius about it.
GreenRain_3_10: I wonder what it would feel like to take a bath in green rain.#$e#I'm talking, like, a bath tub full of green rain.
GreenRainFinished_3_1: A rare weather pattern that happens every year? What a joke.
GreenRainFinished_3_2: I bet Demetrius has fun researching green rain when it comes around.
GreenRainFinished_3_3: I think it took longer than usual for my clothes to dry off.#$e#How did it make my clothes more wet than normal rain?
GreenRainFinished_3_4: I wonder if there's any supernatural explanation for green rain.
GreenRainFinished_3_5: I noticed there's a 'day after' smell with green rain. I like it!
GreenRainFinished_3_6: Even though this is a 'rare weather pattern', I wonder if people found a way to profit off of it.
GreenRainFinished_3_7: Imagine if somehow the green rain managed to give us superpowers!#$e#Watch out, I might end up getting super speed and break the speed limit!#$b#Just kidding!
GreenRainFinished_3_8: I can't play my video games when there's green rain.#$e#I think the rain causes interference with tech.
GreenRainFinished_3_9: I've was able to draw in the rain since it doesn't cause damage to paper!#$b#It's cool how green rain doesn't get paper soggy!
GreenRainFinished_3_10: I think green rain is cool. I never get mad when it comes around!

springRain_2: *jumping in puddle* Splash! Splash! Splash!#$e#%Raven is focused on splashing in puddles.

Fair_Judging_1: It'd be awesome if you won this year!#$b#Your crops always have a wonderful taste to them.

WinterStar_GiveGift_Before_Spouse_1: Surprise! I'm your secret gift giver!#$b#I have a feeling you'll love it.
WinterStar_GiveGift_Before_Spouse_2: Hi babe, you managed to get me this year!#$b#I worked had to get this ready for you.
WinterStar_GiveGift_Before_Spouse_3: Guess who you got, honey!#$b#I hope you didn't find the gift early and try to sneak a peek already.
WinterStar_GiveGift_Before_1: Surprise, @! I'm your secret gift giver.#$b#I had a hard time thinking of something but I think this is perfect.
WinterStar_GiveGift_Before_2: Hi, @, I'm your secret gift giver!#$b#Go ahead and open it. I wanna see your reaction!
WinterStar_GiveGift_Before_3: Guess who it is?#$b#Open it up, I'm excited to see your face.

WinterStar_GiveGift_After_2: I hope you get a lot of use out of your present!

WinterStar_ReceiveGift_2: Aw, thanks for the gift! It's always great to see who my secret gift giver is for the year.
WinterStar_ReceiveGift_3: I bet it took a while to get this for me, thanks!
Introduction: Ah, you're @! It's great to meet you, I'm Raven.#$b#I've heard word going around that we'd be seeing someone new soon.#$e#You'll find me all kinds of places, so you might have a hard time flagging me down for things.
willyCrabs: Gus told me that a bunch of crabs went loose at Willy's shop!#$e#I'd be too scared to even think about getting the place cleaned up.#$b#At that point, the shop is theirs.
pamHouseUpgrade: I think you did a really sweet thing having Pam's trailer turned into a house.#$e#It must take a lot for Pam to swallow her pride, but it's something that they've needed for a long time.
pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I don't know who got Pam's trailer turned into a house, but whoever did it must've really cared.#$e#It's nice to see people investing in the community.
joja_Begin: I know that the community center is gonna be taken over by Joja, but Mayor Lewis could've paid to get it restored if he actually cared about it.$2#$e#I know that man's secrets. He has the money for it, but hoped to get someone to volunteer to get it done.#$b#What a lazy hack of a mayor.
movieTheater: I'm surprised that Pelican Town is getting it's own movie theater! It'll be a ton of fun.#$e#Is it sad to say that I've only been to the movies once in my life?
DumpsterDiveComment_1: Did you find anything good in there?#$b#If you find anything useful that you don't want, let me know!
DumpsterDiveComment_2: Don't let anything go to waste if you know you it can be used!
DumpsterDiveComment_3: Hey, @, if you see any food in there, could you split it with me.#$b#Y-you don't have to though!
DumpsterDiveComment_4: Did you come across any algae?#$b#I wonder how people find algae in town. Isn't it a weird place to see it?
DumpsterDiveComment_5: Just a little advice, you might not wanna be too loud or obvious with dumpster diving.#$b#They WILL look at you weird for it. I just don't want them to judge you, you know?#$b#You're doing great though, I don't mind it.
DumpsterDiveComment_6: Do you ever wonder why some people throw perfectly good food away?#$b#It's like humans are incapable of eating leftovers. Leftovers aren't even bad!#$b#I feel like those kinds of people are spoiled.
DumpsterDiveComment_7: If you come across soggy newspaper, save it so you can recycle it later.#$b#Sometimes you get some cool stuff in return!
DumpsterDiveComment_8: How come the people never toss their old clothes in the trash?#$b#We don't have a thrift store in Pelican Town. Maybe they mail it out to thrift stores in Zuzu or something.
DumpsterDiveComment_9: Find anything weird in the trash?
HitBySlingshot_1: What the fuck is wrong with you?! Don't do that!#$e#%Raven is glaring at you. It feels like a threat.
HitBySlingshot_2: Who did that?!#$b#Wait, @! You know better than to do this! You're a grown adult.#$b#I swear to Yoba... *mutters angrily to themself*#$e#%Raven refuses to speak to you. Maybe you messed up.
HitBySlingshot_3: !!!#$b#Were it not for the laws of this land I-#$b#...#$b#Just screw you!#$e#%Raven looks close to fighting you. Maybe you should leave them alone.
HitBySlingshot_4: You little shit, get out of here!#$e#%Raven refuses to look at you.
HitBySlingshot_5: Do you want me to tell Mayor Lewis about this?!#$b#I'm sure he could get your ass kicked out of here if you keep this shit up!
HitBySlingshot_6: %Raven's eye twitches.#$b#What the fuck did you just do to me you little shit?#$b#I'll have you know I graduated top of my class in the Ferngill Navy and I've been involved in numerous secret raids on top secret groups.#$b#AND I have over 300 confirmed kills.#$b#I am trained in geurilla warfare and I'm the top sniper in the entire armed forces.#$b#You are nothing to me but just another target.#$e#I will wipe you the fuck out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth. Mark my fucking words.#$b#You think you can get away with saying that shit to me to my fucking face? Think again, fucker.#$e#As we speak, I am contacting my secret network of spies across the Ferngill Republic and you're being traced right now.#$b#So you better prepare for the storm, maggot.#$b#The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life.#$e#You're fucking dead, kid.#$b#I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can kill you in over seven hundred ways.#$b#And that's just with my bare hands.#$e#Not only am I extensively trained in unarmed combat, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the military.#$b#I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the continent.#$b#You little shit.#$e#If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little clever comment was about to bring upon you.#$b#Maybe you would have held your fucking tongue. But you couldn't. You didn't.#$b#And now your're paying the price, you goddamn idiot.#$e#I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in it.#$b#You're fucking dead, kiddo.#$e#*sigh* Okay, maybe that stuff isn't true, but still. Don't do that to people. It's rude.
HitBySlingshot_7: I...#$b#I HATE YOU, THAT HURT!#$e#Don't apologize. Get away from me!
HitBySlingshot_9: How would you like it if I hit you with a fucking slingshot?!#$b#You wouldn't like it, would you?!
HitBySlingshot_10: I hope you get hit with a ton of rocks you asshat!
cc_Begin: It seems like there's some activity going on in the Community Center.#$e#Is Mayor Lewis finally getting his shit together and resotring it?#$b#Wait, you're restoring it?#$b#Well, hopefully you aren't mad about not getting compensated for your labor.
cc_Minecart: I saw some critters in the middle of the night swarming some of the Minecarts last night.#$e#I wonder what that's all about.
cc_Greenhouse: I heard you have a greenhouse now! Now it'll be much easier to grow crops year-round.#$e#I wonder how hard it is to grow things in a greenhouse actually.#$b#It'd be cool to use one I think.
cc_Bus: Shoot, I didn't even know the bus was getting repaired! Now I can travel out of town for once.#$e#I just hope the bus fare doesn't make me go broke too fast.
cc_Bridge: Did Robin work on a construction project overnight? The bridge past the mines got repaired.#$e#I kinda wonder what's over there.
cc_Boulder: Have you noticed that boulder near the mines finally dislodged? Now we can go panning for materials!#$e#We live in a really convenient area.#$b#For one, panning for materials isn't something most people can brag about doing from their backyard.
cc_Complete: The fact the Community Center got repaired is a miracle! You did a great job.#$e#You should get paid for the work you did though. I'll try and talk to Mayor Lewis about it.
MovieInvitation_1: You want me to go to the movies with you? That sounds awesome!#$b#Give me a moment to get my stuff together, but I'll meet you there!
MovieInvitation_2: A movie? That sounds awesome! I'll meet you at the theater.
MovieInvitation_3: Ooo, I love movies! Let's go now so we don't miss the next showing. See you there!
MovieInvitation_4: I'm down to watch a movie! See you there.
MovieInvitation_5: I'm just imagining the popcorn right now. I bet it'll taste amazing!

MovieInvite_Spouse_2: Aw, is this a date? How sweet of you!#$b#I'll see you there darling.
MovieInvite_Spouse_3: I'd love to go to the movies!#$b#After all, you deserve a break from all the hard work you do. See you there.
MovieInvite_Spouse_4: Aw, how sweet. Thanks a bunch for inviting me.#$b#I'll see you at the theater honey.
MovieInvite_Spouse_5: Ayyy, let's go check it out! Come on, I wanna see what's playing.

Sorry, but I got invited by someone else. Maybe next time? I'm really sorry.
Oh snap, someone already invited me. I totally would go if I didn't already say yes.

Not today, @. Maybe next time? Thanks for thinking of me.

RejectMovieTicket_Divorced_4: Divorces are rough, you know? I don't think I can hang out with you casually without it getting me upset.

I'm not a fan of that movie. I appreciate you inviting me, though.
That movie isn't for me. Thanks for inviting me, though.
RejectMovieTicket_1: I appreciate the offer, but I'm not really interested at the moment.#$b#Maybe next time!
Resort: Isn't it relaxing to take a little time away from the farm?#$b#You can relax with me if you want! I'd enjoy your company.
Resort_Bar: I think I'll have a beer.#$e#Don't forget the lime, please!
Resort_Chair: These chairs are a little hard, but they're still nice to sit in.
Resort_Dance: I'm having a blast! You should join in on the vibes.

Resort_Shore: I love how the sand feels on my feet!

CheckIn_Mail_1: Hey @,^^I'm glad you've been having a good time in Pelican Town. I figured I'd send a letter to show my appreciation. I know it can be intimidating to talk to new people, but many of them have a lot of stories to tell.^^You can always do what you want, don't let me stop you!^^I wanna make sure you have a good time out here. I'm sure you could use a break from the farm.^^Well, I'll see you later!^^^^^^~ Raven[#]Raven Checking In
